alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Gibson; Henderson; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:39PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Henderson, southeastern Gibson, southwestern Carroll and northeastern Madison Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 338 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Milan, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Humboldt, Milan, Atwood, Medina, Gibson, Howley, Hickory Flat, West, Jumbo, Cedar Grove, Mount Gilead, Cades, New Enterprise, Ledbetter, Lavinia, Scott Hill, Leach, Sitka, Whitthorne and Gann. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
